title: Embedded Software Engineer
description: "ALL our jobs are US based and candidates must be in the US with valid US Work Authorization. Please apply on our website directly." Senior Java Developer w/AWS<br><br>Chicago IL- onsite 3 days per week from day 1<br><br>6 month contract initially; expect extensions<br><br>$70/hr w2 + benefits to candidate<br><br><strong><u>Notes<br><br></u></strong>Higher level developerJava, JavaScript, Spring Boot.Someone experience with AEM is a plus.Cloud experience is a plus. We use AWSWe would prefer React As a member of our Software Engineering Group, we look first and foremost for people who are passionate around solving business problems through innovation and engineering practices. You'll be required to apply your depth of knowledge and expertise to all aspects of the software development lifecycle, as well as partner continuously with your many stakeholders on a daily basis to stay focused on common goals. We embrace a culture of experimentation and constantly strive for improvement and learning. You’ll work in a collaborative, trusting, thought-provoking environment—one that encourages diversity of thought and creative solutions that are in the best interests of our customers globally.This role requires a wide variety of strengths and capabilities, including:- Hands-on experience with A e Experience Manager (Content management &amp; Target)<br><ul><li>BS/BA degree or equivalent experience</li><li>Advanced hands-on experience in Java, Spring Boot, REST API</li><li>Advanced hands-on experience in Apache Web Server, Apache Tomcat, Content Delivery Network (CDN) such asF5, Akamai</li><li>Good knowledge and hands-on experience in integrating enterprise systems</li><li>Advanced hands-on experience in cloud technologies such as AWS and Cloud Foundry</li><li>Advanced hands-on experience in testing tools – Junit, Selenium</li><li>Hands-on experience in databases such as Oracle, MySQL</li><li>Hands-on experience in DevOps and CI/CD practices</li><li>Exposure to ReactJs, NodeJs, Python, GraphQL is a plus</li><li>Knowledge on Search Engines such Apache SOLR is a plus</li><li>Knowledge of industry-wide technology trends and best practices</li><li>Ability to work in large, collaborative teams to achieve organizational goals</li><li>Passionate about continuous learning and building an innovative culture</li><li>Understanding of software skills such as business analysis, development, maintenance, and software improvement</li></ul>

title: Chicago Aerospace Engineering Tutor
description: <strong>Highland Park Aerospace Engineering Tutor Jobs<br><br></strong>The Varsity Tutors platform has thousands of students looking for online Aerospace Engineering tutors nationally and in Highland Park. As a tutor who uses the Varsity Tutors platform, you can earn good money, choose your own hours, and truly make a difference in the lives of your students.<br><br><strong>Why join our platform?<br></strong><ul><li>Enjoy competitive rates and get paid 2x per week.</li><li>Choose to tutor as much or as little as you want.</li><li>Set your own hours and schedule.</li><li>Get paired with students best-suited to your teaching style and preferences (from thousands of potential clients).</li><li>Tutor online (i.e. “work remotely”) using our purpose-built Live Learning Platform.</li><li>Students can take adaptive assessments through the platform and share results to help you decide where to focus.</li><li>We collect payment from the customers, so all you have to do is invoice the session.<br></li></ul><strong><u>What We Look For In a Tutor<br></u></strong><ul><li>You have excellent communication skills and a friendly, approachable personality.</li><li>You can show subject-matter expertise in Aerospace Engineering.</li><li>You have the ability to personalize lessons for each student.<br></li></ul><strong>Discover all the ways you can reach students through the online platform:<br></strong><ul><li>1-on-1 Online Tutoring: connect with an individual student for a highly personalized learning experience.</li><li>Small Group Classes: meet with small groups (typically 7-9 students) for a more collaborative learning experience.</li><li>Large Live Classes: share your knowledge with hundreds of students at a time.</li><li>Instant Tutoring: accept subject-specific, on-demand tutoring sessions whenever you’d like.<br></li></ul><strong><u>About Varsity Tutors And 1-on-1 Online Tutoring<br><br></u></strong>Our mission is to transform the way people learn. We do this by leveraging advanced technology, AI, and the latest in learning science to facilitate a personalized learning experience. With 1-on-1 Online Tutoring, individual students are connected with tutors for a highly personalized learning experience. title: Java Software Engineer
description: <strong>Job Summary:<br><br></strong>This role performs and implements activities that impacts components or processes of specified functional areas of the Walgreens business software products OR Digital or Online application in an Agile environment. Work is typically received in short term assignments that often require the application of independent judgment. Operates within the context of defined procedures that provide desired functionality to digital solutions, products and programs, typically for intermediary, basic to complex systems. Implements activities that influence entry to mid level components of the functional area.<br><br><strong>Job Responsibilities:<br></strong><ul><li>Writes code that meets specifications. Develops software applications and tools. </li><li>Completes programming and performs testing and debugging applications</li><li>Develops software applications and tools using Java or React JS and Agile development methodologies. </li><li>Actively designs, architectures and builds phases utilizing Java or React JS to aim at producing high quality deliverables, working with existing architects where appropriate. </li><li>Evaluates compatibility of programs with existing communications hardware and software features. Develops professional expertise, applies company policies and procedures to resolve a variety of issues. </li><li>Works on problems where analysis of situations or data requires a review of a variety of factors. Exercises judgment to determine appropriate action. </li><li>Builds productive internal or external working relationships. </li><li>Demonstrates proficiency in several areas of the professional function. </li><li>Has working knowledge of programming languages important to the organization, including Java or React JS. </li><li>Effectively resolves problems and roadblocks as they occur. Has working knowledge of programming languages important to the organization. </li><li>Interacts with internal and external peers and or managers to exchange semi-complex information related to assigned activities. </li><li>Acts as individual contributor as well as team member</li><li>Utilizes experience in order to identify problematic relationships. </li><li>Anticipates, prevents and eliminates problems and creates efficient fixes. </li><li>Gathers and updates necessary information and communicates to appropriate parties. </li></ul><strong>About Walgreens and WBA<br><br></strong>Walgreens (www.walgreens.com) is included in the U.S. Retail Pharmacy and U.S. Healthcare segments of Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. (Nasdaq: WBA), an integrated healthcare, pharmacy and retail leader with a 170-year heritage of caring for communities. WBA’s purpose is to create more joyful lives through better health. Operating nearly 9,000 retail locations across America, Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands, Walgreens is proud to be a neighborhood health destination serving nearly 10 million customers each day. Walgreens pharmacists play a critical role in the U.S. healthcare system by providing a wide range of pharmacy and healthcare services, including those that drive equitable access to care for the nation’s medically underserved populations. To best meet the needs of customers and patients, Walgreens offers a true omnichannel experience, with fully integrated physical and digital platforms supported by the latest technology to deliver high-quality products and services in communities nationwide.<br><br><strong>Basic Qualifications<br></strong><ul><li>Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or similar field and at least 2 years of professional work experience in Engineering, Software Engineering or similar field</li><li>Experience working with React Js and or Java</li><li>Proficient in back end languages, such as Java, Node or Typescript, Dot NET, Python etc with exposure to performance optimization of high traffic and scalable services</li><li>Knowledge of software engineering best practices including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build process, testing and operations</li><li>Experience writing code for applications or automation</li><li>Experience with programming languages for online applications, microservices, apis or mobile applications</li><li>Experience building ,testing applications or automation</li><li>Knowledge of the Software Development Life Cycle</li><li>Experience creating coding solutions to fix moderate problems or issue</li><li>Willing to travel up to or at least 10% of the time for business purposes (within state and out of state). <br><br></li></ul><strong>Preferred Qualifications<br></strong><ul><li>Experience with full stack development ranging from front end user interfaces to back end systems</li><li>Hands on with modern ui frameworks like React with good knowledge of front end design pattern (stateless components, conditional rendering, controlled components, hooks etc.)</li><li>Excellent knowledge of distributed SQL (example, Oracle, MySQL), NoSQL (MongoDB, Cassandra) design and consumption patterns</li><li>Experience with implementation, capacity planning and performance tuning of Cloud technologies Azure (ACS, AKS), Google, IBM, AWS or Cloud Foundry</li><li>Experience in a retail digital ecommerce space</li></ul>

title: Staff Software Engineer
description: <strong>Summary<br><br></strong>This role will work alongside team of diversely skilled team of talented engineers working on building foundational components required by our risk platform, all while enriching and advancing the platform providing sound technical decisions around design, architecture and development. This role must be able to solve problems creatively, communicate effectively within and outside the team and proactively engage in technical decision making to achieve desired objectives. Strong technical and architecture skills, technical leadership and development, Agile expertise, and the ability to effectively execute on multiple fronts are baseline expectations for this role. This role will be a team player and work well with business, technical and non-technical professionals in agile environment. This role, most critically, will support change and improve processes.<br><br><strong>Responsibilities<br></strong><ul><li>Design &amp; Develop software employing object oriented techniques &amp; functional programming paradigm in Java8 or higher versions</li><li>Collaborate with other departments to deliver complex projects which may involve multiple systems</li><li>Review and understand business and technical requirements; translate those into flexible, scalable, resilient design proposals</li><li>Review architecture proposals with tech leads in the firm as well as senior business partners</li><li>Drive strategies and transition plans to deliver target state architectures</li><li>Drive and support development of solutions to complex technical challenges while coding, testing, troubleshooting, debugging, and documenting the systems</li><li>Drive various enterprise level architecture initiatives covering Risk Platform interactions at enterprise level and help flush out reference architecture with POC/Designs</li><li>Drive development of solution / solution architecture on Renaissance Risk Platform project team</li><li>Lead architecture &amp; design tasks supporting development of core infrastructure services for risk platform</li><li>Analyze, document, refine, and maintain architectures that are developed within the team</li><li>Drive team that optimizes application performance through analysis, code refactoring, and system tuning<br><br></li></ul><strong>Supervisory Responsibilities<br></strong><ul><li>None<br><br></li></ul><strong>Qualifications &amp; Experience<br></strong><ul><li>[Required] Excellent oral and written communication skills</li><li>[Required] 8+ years of Java-based software development experience and must have good to deep knowledge of internal working of Java</li><li>[Required] Spring framework based software development experience</li><li>[Required] Fluent in object-oriented design, industry best practices, software patterns, and architecture principles</li><li>[Required] Strong testing experience with developing test plans, automated test cases, and working with test frameworks; must have development experience where code coverage exceeds 85%</li><li>[Required] Deep understanding of performance issues and multi-threaded development</li><li>[Required] Experience documenting design proposals through clear and comprehensive diagrams, uses cases, and written documents</li><li>[Required] Experience defining and documenting architecture strategies, designs, and requirements across all enterprise architecture domains – business, information systems (applications &amp; data), and technology</li><li>[Required] Good understanding of architecture design mechanisms and steps including logical/conceptual, business and physical architectures</li><li>[Required] 'Get stuff done’ and flexible mindset for greater good of the organization<br><br></li></ul><strong>Technical Skills &amp; Background<br></strong><ul><li>[Preferred] Experience with high speed distributed computing frameworks involving MapReduce technologies like Apache Spark, Kafka Streams, Apache Flink etc. is desirable.</li><li>[Required] Experience in developing cloud native applications running on containers. title: Software Engineer II
description: Job:<p><br></p>Senior Site Reliability Engineer (DevOps)<p><br></p>We are looking for a Senior SRE to join our technology team to solve exciting business problems in the domain of commercial banking, and financial services. Candidates must have a strong curiosity for data and a proven track record of successfully implementing AWS solutions with proficiency in software engineering. This is a unique opportunity to apply your skills and have a direct impact on a global business.<p><br></p>The ideal candidate will have a strong knowledge of AWS solutions, Java, Python, and data applications. They should also have strong software engineering skills and the ability to build systems that reach very large Enterprise scale.<p><br></p>What You'll Do:<p><br></p><ul><li>Maintain stability of transactions, and troubleshoot middleware, server, load balancer, application, network, database issues on all the environments.</li><li>Provide operational support for systems and maintain software applications including software upgrades to support production operations.</li><li>Debug issues in the production environment through analyzing logs, collection metrics, and leveraging app-monitoring tools, and create solutions for sustained resiliency.</li><li>Partner with application development teams to understand new projects, cross-pipeline requirements, and set Production support team expectations</li><li>Develop end-to-end CI/CD ML pipelines to deploy the knowledge graphs and associated processes</li><li>Minimize manual involvement for the team by driving solutions in automation and implementing continuous improvements that creates a more stable operating environment, including development &amp; configuration for dynamic monitoring, alerting &amp; recovery.</li><li>Build infrastructure as code processes to have a fully resilient and performant environment on AWS </li></ul><p><br></p>Basic Qualifications:<p><br></p><ul><li>Required: 5+ years working in a SRE/DevOps engineering role</li><li>Experience with at least 1 high-level programming language (Java, Python, etc)</li><li>Experience with setting up and managing GitHub and using GitHub Actions</li><li>Experience with setting up CI/CD pipelines for building and deploying microservice based applications</li><li>Expertise in build and deploy tools such as (Jenkins, CircleCI, Bamboo, Harness)</li><li>Experience with infrastructure as code (Terraform, Ansible, Helm)</li><li>Experience with infrastructure components such as routers, load balancers, cloud products, container systems, compute, storage and networks</li><li>Experience setting up and managing Kubernetes (or similar) clusters</li><li>Knowledge of deploying to and running on Cloud providers: AWS, Google Cloud Platform, Azure</li><li>Excellent debugging and trouble shooting skills</li></ul>

title: Software Engineer (RxR) Chicago V
description: <ul><li>Description: We have an opportunity for a<br><br></li></ul>Fullstack developer! If you are an EXPERT full stack developer actively looking for a role please apply* *this role does require onsite availability at least one day a week We are seeking a Full Stack Software Engineer with a Back-End emphasis, that is capable of delivering a project from start to finish. This person will be responsible for Cloud/Server based software development featuring the Linux, Postgres, Golang/C/C++, Swagger/RESTAPI, ReactJS. This role is expected to provide strong technical leadership and mentor less experienced members within the framework of an Agile software development team. The Software Engineer must exhibit a strong sense of ownership regarding the technical solutions arrived at when implementing complex software designs. The work involves the full complement of software life cycle development activities required to deploy high quality software that meets the requirements of our aerospace customers.<br><br>The candidate will be working in: React for the U.I. Go (Golang or Go programming) for the back-end C/C++ experience could be good enough if someone doesn't have Golang The candidate will also be responsible for database architecture and SQL programming. The candidate will have the opportunity to mentor others and assign work. The candidate needs to understand full stack development from start to finish and be able to deliver an end product / website<br><br>Responsibilities: Participate in software development activities including requirement specification, design definition, code implementation, system integration and test Generate software lifecycle documentation to support certification of products Integrate and debug Linux Server based software executing on Servers in Cloud based environments Participate and contribute to Sprint Planning, Backlog grooming, Sprint Demos. Perform and/or provide guidance for verification activities including test definition, test development and testing methods Work daily in Azure DevOps to do requirements analysis, requirement derivation, create User Stories and Task, Perform Code Reviews Establish test frameworks to implement Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) Enhance Linux based systems by studying the latest open source software Utilize avionics standards such as ARINC and RTCA in the development testing<br><br>About Actalent:<br><br>Actalent connects passion with purpose. Our scalable talent solutions and services capabilities drive value and results and provide the expertise to help our customers achieve more. Every day, our experts around the globe are making an impact. We’re supporting critical initiatives in engineering and sciences that advance how companies serve the world. Actalent promotes consultant care and engagement through experiences that enable continuous development. Our people are the difference. Actalent is an operating company of Allegis Group, the global leader in talent solutions. The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

description: <strong>Fully Remote Embedded Software Engineer Role!</strong><p><br></p>This Jobot Job is hosted by: Josh Morris<p><br></p>Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button and sending us your resume.<p><br></p>Salary: $95,000 - $110,000 per year<p><br></p><strong>A bit about us:</strong><p><br></p>One of our favorite clients is in need of an embedded software/firmware engineer to join their growing team ASAP! If you meet the requirements below please apply NOW!<p><br></p><strong>Why join us?</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Medical</li><li>Dental</li><li>Vision</li><li>401k</li><li>Very flexible PTO</li><li>FSA</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Job Details</strong><p><br></p><strong>Responsibilities</strong><p><br></p><ul><li> Successful candidate should be responsible, motivated, and a self-starter who is self-directed on their assigned Agile team.</li><li> Develop new and support existing functionality within our existing software suite of embedded products and systems.</li><li> Develop new services in our future software suite of embedded products.</li><li> Participate in a small, experienced, energetic team in a Lean continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/DI), agile development.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Required Skills &amp; Knowledge</strong><p><br></p><ul><li> 3 (+) years' experience with C++ in Linux environment (Ubuntu, or any other equivalent variant)</li><li> 3(+) years' experience in cross compiling and troubleshooting C++ application with ARM32 or 64 bit target</li><li> 1 (+) years' experience with edge device /embedded platforms database sqlite3 or similar</li><li> Good understanding of object-oriented programming using C++</li><li> Experience working with TCP/IP socket communications, understanding of websockets</li><li> Understanding software development lifecycle, (SDLC) best practices.</li><li> Candidate must be an effective verbal and written communicator with strong analytical and organizational skills</li><li> Must demonstrate ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment, balancing business needs with a solid commitment to quality, performance, and support.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Prefered Skills &amp; Experience</strong><p><br></p><ul><li> Working Experience with C++ in Linux with embedded devices running any flavor of Linux OS and integrating it to Cloud (Azure/AWS/Google Cloud Platform)services (Edge/Cloud Integration) </li><li> Ability to develop cross platform application with ARM64 or similar and ability to debug with Linux target platform with arm architecture</li><li> Experience with implementing messaging clients , clients processing JSON data on a Linux device is an added plus</li><li> Prior experience in integrating device drivers/ building as a part of device firmware is desirable</li></ul><p><br></p>EDUCATION:<p><br></p><ul><li> Degree from a four-year college or university in computer science, computer engineering, electrical engineering or equivalent with C++ programming background</li><li> Good communication skills both verbal and written</li><li> Excels at operating in a fast pace, collaborative environment</li><li> Open to direction and collaborative work style with a commitment to get the job done</li><li> Ability to look at situations from several points of view</li><li> Development experience with cross platform applications and deploying to Linux devices is preferred</li></ul><p><br></p>Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button. Embedded Firmware/Software Engineer
